data.title: Solar Water Well
data.summary: Provide easy access to clean water for the vilage, supports 800+ individuals. Harnessing sunlight to quench thirst, illuminating lives with sustainable water solutions.

featuredImage.alt: Learn About our project Sadaqah Wells - Africa Relief

content.heading: Every drop, powered by the sun, a life-changing oasis in arid lands
content.description: Solar Water Wells signify more than water; they represent hope and sustainability. Join us in providing enduring access to clean water

content.heading: How is ARCD's Relief responding?
content.description: RCDâ€™s Relief installs solar-powered water wells, ensuring reliable access to clean water in regions facing water scarcity due to limited resources.

content.heading: Building a well, Crafting Hope
content.description: Your donation fuels the installation of solar water wells, enabling communities to thrive sustainably by providing access to clean, reliable water sources, transforming lives for generations.
